title: Could Brees Bail? Cousins Tagged In A Different Way, Seeya Suh, Bills Plan (Football 03/12)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Writer John Breech to discuss the opening of the legal tampering period in the NFL, and the news Monday brought. Believe it or not, we start with the trade of an offensive lineman, and how the Bills will now approach the draft. Will and John discuss Drew Brees potentially signing somewhere other than New Orleans, and why teams should be aggressive in pursuit of the future Hall-of-Famer. The guys also analyze a new kind of tag applied to Kirk Cousins and possible destinations for the former Redskin. Brinson and Breech talk about the Dolphins' plan after releasing Ndamukong Suh, and more!
